name: Ashford Hospitality Trust, Inc.
description: Ashford Hospitality Trust, Inc. is a real estate investment trust (REIT) focusing on investments in the hospitality sector. Founded in 2003 and headquartered in Dallas, Texas, AHT primarily invests in upscale and luxury hotels across the United States. The company’s strategy involves acquiring, owning, and managing hotel properties that are primarily branded under major hotel flags, including Marriott, Hilton, and Hyatt. Ashford Hospitality Trust aims to provide attractive returns to its investors through its disciplined investment approach, focusing on markets with high barriers to entry and strong demand for lodging. AHT actively seeks opportunities to enhance property performance through strategic renovations and operational improvements. The company also emphasizes sustainability and responsible investing practices, which it believes contribute to long-term value creation. With a diverse portfolio that includes properties in key urban markets and popular tourist destinations, Ashford Hospitality Trust is committed to delivering exceptional guest experiences while maximizing its financial performance.
